title: Champion Ward Skin Concepts (Ideas)

embed.description: Drawn on paper, Scanned onto my computer, Edited on photoshop. Font used: Agency FB and Laffayette Comic pro.

body:
They are 'Ward Skins', so I assume this discussion is relevant in this board?
These are some Ward Designs I came up with.{{item:2044}}   (Image on my deviant art submission link).

There are 3 Different designs, 1 for Fiddlesticks{{champion:9}}, 1 for Gnar{{champion:150}}  and 1 for Olaf{{champion:2}}  .
I took heavy inspiration from the the splash art from each champion to create concepts of wards which reference them.
The idea was to have wards like these available for any champion to use, It wasn't my intention to have the idea that these wards are only available when playing that champion. Instead they are just the same as other ward 'Skins' in the Riot store.
This discussion was previously created in the community creations, but the rules say that you can post the same discussion in multiple boards where they apply.

-Thanks.
'MrB3NN' (EUW)

(Discussion in Community creations: http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-creations-en/5O0sVnfX-champion-ward-concepts-ideas)

replies.body: A Jax Lamp-Post ward would be nice, I think.

I feel you could troll enemies with the olaf ward. If you use it, they might flash, only to realize it's a ward.
I would like a helmet-bro helmet-ward
to make it more confusing, what if we made all wards a skill shot?

Yes, make wards a skill shot that deal 10% of maximum hp in true damage and are lodged in enemy target granting sight for 3 mintues. That'll make people buy wards :)

 {{item:2044}} {{item:2050}} {{item:2043}}

Wards are ground targeted instant skillshots.
Got ya there mate.
Wacky waving inflatable arm flailing tube ward?

Not too bad! We could always use more Champion-based wards!

I'm a bit biased towards the Gnar one, but the Fiddlesticks ward looks cool too. No real opinion on the Olaf Ward.
Olaf Axe can be a little confuse.

All these ideas are great, including the ones in the comments. If we could have a bunch more ward skins it would be great.

Gonna add my idea, Garen ward Skin. Huge sword stuck, stabbing straight down into the rock.

Fiddle's is the best, though Olaf's is a 2nd for me. 

I think Olaf's would be better if it was angled the other way, with the blade tipped downward so the handle is sticking up. this way it feels like Olaf threw his axe into the ground rather than sticking it into a rock.
This idea is awesome, Fid ward is the best one.
I want a Nami ward, it would be her staff embedded in a rock and waves could wash up to it occasionally. But as to yours, Fiddle ward all the way.
Fiddles all the way.  And awesome art man!
